title: YARD / CUNO FRIDGE
description: Ask if Cuno knows a place you could stash the dead body.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""For the fuck-gimp? Good thing you..."
dialogueTree.text: "For the fuck-gimp? Good thing you asked The Cunmeister." He nods, trying to look older. "Cuno knows a fridge, perfect for freezing f****ts."

links.title: You: ""Really? I don't believe it.""
links.text: "Really? I don't believe it."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows all kinds of shit. Cuno..."
links.text: "Cuno knows all kinds of shit. Cuno gets *around*."

links.title: You: ""Where can I find this perfect frid..."
links.text: "Where can I find this perfect fridge, then?"

links.title: You: ""I thought you would! Where is it?""
links.text: "I thought you would! Where is it?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Baconman's in a rush. But what's i..."
links.text: "Baconman's in a rush. But what's in it for the Cuno?" He crosses his arms. "What's the return on Cuno's investment?"

links.title: Half Light: "Don't fuck it up, you *need* a frid..."
links.text: Don't fuck it up, you *need* a fridge.

links.title: Suggestion: "Now is the time to be humble. Say t..."
links.text: Now is the time to be humble. Say the *sir* thing.

links.title: You: ""A corpse-free yard. Don't you have..."
links.text: "A corpse-free yard. Don't you have civic pride?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's got everything Cuno needs...."
links.text: "Cuno's got everything Cuno needs. All civics and shit."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He doesn't know what that means. Ta..."
links.text: He doesn't know what that means. Talking about *civics and shit* didn't make this any easier.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You can't buy Cuno, pig! Cuno's al..."
links.text: "You can't buy Cuno, pig! Cuno's already got everything!"

links.title: You: ""Kind sir, I'll repay you for this..."
links.text: "Kind sir, I'll repay you for this information one day. Right now the clock is ticking."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's clock's not doing shit." He..."
links.text: "Cuno's clock's not doing shit." He looks at his wrist. "Cuno's got a fuckload of time."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There's nothing on his wrist."
links.text: There's nothing on his wrist.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Don't believe him, Cuno! He just w..."
links.text: "Don't believe him, Cuno! He just wants to use your fridge!"

links.title: You: "Convince *the Cuno* to spill the be..."
links.text: Convince *the Cuno* to spill the beans.

links.title: Rhetoric: "By killing in his territory, someon..."
links.text: By killing in his territory, someone has *openly challenged* Cuno. It's in his best interest to put them in their place.

links.title: You: ""Some arrogant shit thinks he can k..."
links.text: "Some arrogant shit thinks he can kill in the Cuno's kingdom, without asking the Cuno first? That sounds like lawlessness to me."

links.title: Cuno: "A dark flame smoulders in Cuno's ey..."
links.text: A dark flame smoulders in Cuno's eyes as he ponders your argument -- wordless. Like kings do.

links.title: You: ""This outlaw's fate is in your hand..."
links.text: "This outlaw's fate is in your hands. Let's make an example of him. Help me *locate* him using fridge-body technology."

links.title: Cuno: ""All right. Cuno hears you. See tha..."
links.text: "All right. Cuno hears you. See that shit house over there?" He points to the collapsed building with the bookstore.

links.title: Shivers: "A cold comes over you as you glance..."
links.text: A cold comes over you as you glance behind him -- at the crumbling colossus there, casting a shadow on you.

links.title: You: ""Yes, I see it. The big tall one be..."
links.text: "Yes, I see it. The big tall one behind you."

links.title: Cuno: ""You gotta get in that shit." He po..."
links.text: "You gotta get in that shit." He points again. "In there *deep*."

links.title: You: ""I was in there already.""
links.text: "I was in there already."

links.title: Cuno: ""And you didn't notice the fucking..."
links.text: "And you didn't notice the fucking *ice bear* fridge?" The kid scoffs. "Pig, you need a new pair of eyes. This is fucking embarrassing."

links.title: You: ""Ah, I didn't check the basement wh..."
links.text: "Ah, I didn't check the basement when I was there..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Listen to Cuno -- *always* check t..."
links.text: "Listen to Cuno -- *always* check the basement." He nods solemnly and crosses his arms. "Cuno always checks basements. Deep style."

links.title: Cuno: ""There's a giant fridge down there...."
links.text: "There's a giant fridge down there. Fuck-gimp will fit, no problem." He nods confidently. "It looks like a white bear or some shit. Try not to piss yourself when you see it."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A white bear? A polar bear?"
links.text: A white bear? A polar bear?

links.title: You: ""What do you mean *in there deep*?""
links.text: "What do you mean *in there deep*?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Check the fucking basement, pig. D..."
links.text: "Check the fucking basement, pig. Don't you know anything?" The kid rolls his eyes. "Always check the fucking basement. Recon style."

links.title: You: ""How do I get *in* the building aga..."
links.text: "How do I get *in* the building again?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Through the book-store. You gotta..."
links.text: "Through the book-store. You gotta beg the book-bitch. Used to be you could get in there through the doorbell, jam that shit. Bookbitch changed that. Cuno doesn't beg -- so Cuno doesn't go there anymore."

links.title: You: ""Beg the book-bitch?""
links.text: "Beg the book-bitch?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah. Book-bitch. Beg her. You stu..."
links.text: "Yeah. Book-bitch. Beg her. You stupid or something?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He means the bookstore -- we have..."
links.text: "He means the bookstore -- we have to ask..." He checks his notes. "*Plaisance* is the mother of the little girl peddling books on the plaza. We have to ask Plaisance, in the store."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Impressive note-keeping, lieutenant..."
links.text: Impressive note-keeping, lieutenant.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He means the bookstore -- we have..."
links.text: "He means the bookstore -- we have to ask the proprietor of the bookstore."

links.title: Cuno: ""See? The 'clard gets it," he says..."
links.text: "See? The 'clard gets it," he says with a nod. "Listen to your four-eyed friend."

links.title: You: ""You mean Plaisance from the bookst..."
links.text: "You mean Plaisance from the bookstore?"

links.title: Cuno: ""See? It wasn't that hard, pissmidg..."
links.text: "See? It wasn't that hard, pissmidget!"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I already tried that. It's n..."
links.text: "Yeah, I already tried that. It's not that easy."

links.title: Cuno: ""Then try again! Cuno's not your br..."
links.text: "Then try again! Cuno's not your brain slave, think for yourself, pig!"

links.title: You: ""Thanks, Cuno." (Conclude.)"
links.text: "Thanks, Cuno." (Conclude.)

links.title: Cuno: ""You didn't hear it from Cuno, pig...."
links.text: "You didn't hear it from Cuno, pig." He looks at you seriously. "But don't forget where you heard it from."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Cuno owns you now, pig! You're Cun..."
links.text: "Cuno owns you now, pig! You're Cuno's property!"

links.title: You: ""You mean the Doomed Commercial Are..."
links.text: "You mean the Doomed Commercial Area?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Whatever, don't fuck back at the C..."
links.text: "Whatever, don't fuck back at the Cuno." He makes a sudden discarding motion. "You gotta get *in* that shit. In there deep."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes, he means the Doomed Commercial..."
links.text: Yes, he means the Doomed Commercial Area.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Cuno's a poor kid from a poor neigh..."
links.text: Cuno's a poor kid from a poor neighbourhood. Say your job is on the line. He'll sympathize.

links.title: You: "Am I sure about this? Sounds sort o..."
links.text: Am I sure about this? Sounds sort of weak...

links.title: Rhetoric: "No, it's not weak. It's sincere. Do..."
links.text: No, it's not weak. It's sincere. Do not confuse sincerity with weakness. Say it. Trust me.

links.title: You: "So not sure about this. Asking for..."
links.text: So not sure about this. Asking for *class solidarity* seems naive in this case.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Can't you see his hair is red -- th..."
links.text: Can't you see his hair is red -- the colour of social democracy?

links.title: You: "Aren't social democrats traitors?"
links.text: Aren't social democrats traitors?

links.title: Rhetoric: "Not all of them. Social democrats h..."
links.text: Not all of them. Social democrats have their hearts in the right place. Some of them can be valuable *allies* if you turn them.

links.title: You: ""That doesn't mean anything.""
links.text: "That doesn't mean anything."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Just trust me. He'll sympathize if..."
links.text: Just trust me. He'll sympathize if he realizes you could actually lose your job over this.

links.title: You: ""Kid, this is *serious*. My job is..."
links.text: "Kid, this is *serious*. My job is on the line. If I don't get this sorted, I might actually get fired..."

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck are you doing right now?"..."
links.text: "The fuck are you doing right now?" He looks at you suspiciously. "The fuck is this shit?!"

links.title: Rhetoric: "Don't pay attention to him. Just ke..."
links.text: Don't pay attention to him. Just keep telling your sad story.

links.title: You: ""I've lost almost everything, Cuno...."
links.text: "I've lost almost everything, Cuno. My memory, my money, even my name... I *can't* lose my job too! Please, PLEASE help me..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uhm..." The lieutenant's eyes flas..."
links.text: "Uhm..." The lieutenant's eyes flash behind his glasses. "It's not *that* dramatic. We can just send the body to Processing..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's never seen anything so lame..."
links.text: "Cuno's never seen anything so lame..." he says mostly to himself. "Listen, pig... If you were Cuno, the fuck would you care?"

links.title: You: "This isn't working at all, you lied..."
links.text: This isn't working at all, you lied to me, Golden Mouth Man.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You just haven't done it long enoug..."
links.text: You just haven't done it long enough. You need to do it even longer.

links.title: Drama: "The Golden Mouth Man is a liar. He..."
links.text: The Golden Mouth Man is a liar. He can't be trusted, sire. He only wants to humiliate you.

links.title: Volition: "Paranoid whisperings. He is not try..."
links.text: Paranoid whisperings. He is not trying to humiliate you. He just doesn't know better.

links.title: Rhetoric: "See, I'm not trying to humiliate yo..."
links.text: See, I'm not trying to humiliate you. I just don't know any better. Say it!

links.title: Rhetoric: "No, it's the Face Blob who's trying..."
links.text: No, it's the Face Blob who's trying to humiliate you. Why does he speak like that? Why can't he speak like a normal person?

links.title: You: ""You're right, Cuno -- if I were Cu..."
links.text: "You're right, Cuno -- if I were Cuno, I probably wouldn't care..."

links.title: Cuno: ""See, Sadshit..." He turns curiousl..."
links.text: "See, Sadshit..." He turns curiously patient and explains: "Cuno doesn't fucking care about this sad shit. *Your* sad shit."

links.title: Cuno: ""Now how about you at least try to..."
links.text: "Now how about you at least try to entertain the Cuno -- or get the fuck off his crime scene?"

links.title: You: ""This isn't about me, Cuno, it's ab..."
links.text: "This isn't about me, Cuno, it's about the people I'm trying to help. It's too late for me anyway..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Stop shitting yourself in front of..."
links.text: "Stop shitting yourself in front of the Cuno. Cuno thought you were some kind of big shit, what is this..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why don't we go pester some other..."
links.text: "Why don't we go pester some other kids now?" he says impatiently.

links.title: Logic: "Hmm... That's actually not such a b..."
links.text: Hmm... That's actually not such a bad idea. Kids do see stuff.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He just has *no* heart and *no* sym..."
links.text: He just has *no* heart and *no* sympathy for the cause. It's not your fault.

links.title: Logic: "Maybe you should ask these things f..."
links.text: Maybe you should ask these things from other, more well mannered kids the next time. Hmm...

links.title: You: ""If you don't tell me, I'll have to..."
links.text: "If you don't tell me, I'll have to go ask other people, and that will take too long... The body is decomposing..."

links.title: Cuno: ""But you see," he says slowly, savo..."
links.text: "But you see," he says slowly, savouring every word, "Cuno *wants* for it to decompose. Cuno digs that cadaver shit."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Go fuck off and ask someone else!..."
links.text: "Go fuck off and ask someone else! Cuno's not gonna snitch, he likes corpses!"

links.title: You: ""Fine, Cuno... *Don't* help me then..."
links.text: "Fine, Cuno... *Don't* help me then." (Back off.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Wasn't going to." He waves you off..."
links.text: "Wasn't going to." He waves you off. "Cuno's not into bacon-charity."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You can't turn Cuno into your litt..."
links.text: "You can't turn Cuno into your little popo-man! Cuno's his *own* man!"
